name: Claim LUPA Indicator Code
description: The code used to identify those Home Health PPS claims that have 4 visits or less in a 60-day episode.

additional: eob.information[N].code.coding[N].display = {corresponding description from valueset specified in .system}
eob.information[N].category.coding[N].display = 'Claim HHA Low Utilization Payment Adjustment (LUPA) Indicator Code'
